text: hananim-i cheonsadeul-ege myeonglyeonghayeo adam-ege bubog hala hayeoss-eul ttae geudeul-eun buboghayeoss-euna ibeulliseuneun geuleohge ani haessdeola geuneun yeongmaui bulyulosseo junim-ui myeonglyeong-eul geoyeog han jala geuleonde neohuineun na anin geuwa geuui jason-eul bohojalo samneu nyo geudeul-eun neohuiui jeog-ini hananim anin usang-eul sungbaehaneun joeindeul-egejaeang-i iss-eulila
